h4.p: [27] maṃsaṃ nhāru {nahāru (sī0 pī0), nahārū (syā0 kaṃ0)} aṭṭhi {aṭṭhī (syā0 kaṃ)} aṭṭhimiñjaṃ vakkaṃ,
[27] antaṃ antaguṇaṃ udariyaṃ karīsaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ {( ) sabbattha natthi, aṭṭhakathā ca dvattiṃsasaṅkhyā ca manasi kātabbā},
[26] pittaṃ semhaṃ pubbo lohitaṃ sedo medo,
[22] assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā muttanti {muttaṃ, matthake matthaluṅganti (syā0)}..

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^V0.0004^ea^ me sutaṃ -- ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi --
[22] pūjā ca pūjaneyyānaṃ {pūjanīyānaṃ (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)}, etaṃ maṅgalamuttamaṃ..
[22] subhāsitā ca yā vācā, etaṃ maṅgalamuttamaṃ..
[21] ``gāravo ^a^V0.0005^ea^ ca nivāto ca, santuṭṭhi ca kataññutā.
[22] kālena dhammassavanaṃ {dhammassāvaṇaṃ (ka0 sī0), dhammasavanaṃ (ka0 sī0)}, etaṃ maṅgalamuttamaṃ..
[22] sabbattha sotthiṃ gacchanti, taṃ tesaṃ maṅgalamuttama''nti..
[21] yānīdha ^a^T0.0005^ea^ bhūtāni samāgatāni, bhummāni {bhūmāni (ka0)} vā yāni va antalikkhe.
[22] sabbeva bhūtā sumanā bhavantu, athopi sakkacca suṇantu bhāsitaṃ..
[21] tasmā ^a^M0.0005^ea^ hi bhūtā nisāmetha sabbe, mettaṃ karotha mānusiyā pajāya.
[22] divā ca ratto ca haranti ye baliṃ, tasmā hi ne rakkhatha appamattā..
[21] yaṃ kiñci vittaṃ idha vā huraṃ vā, saggesu ^a^P0.0004^ea^ vā yaṃ ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ.
[27] na no samaṃ atthi tathāgatena, idampi buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ.
[21] khayaṃ ^a^V0.0006^ea^ virāgaṃ amataṃ paṇītaṃ, yadajjhagā sakyamunī samāhito.
[27] na tena dhammena samatthi kiñci, idampi dhamme ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ.
[27] samādhinā tena samo na vijjati, idampi dhamme ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ.
[21] ye puggalā aṭṭha sataṃ pasatthā, cattāri etāni yugāni honti.
[27] te dakkhiṇeyyā sugatassa sāvakā, etesu dinnāni mahapphalāni.
[22] idampi saṅghe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, etena saccena suvatthi hotu..
[21] ye suppayuttā manasā daḷhena, nikkāmino gotamasāsanamhi.
[27] te pattipattā amataṃ vigayha, laddhā mudhā nibbutiṃ {nibbuti (ka0)} bhuñjamānā.
[22] idampi ^a^M0.0006^ea^ saṅghe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, etena saccena suvatthi hotu..
[21] yathindakhīlo pathavissito {paṭhavissito (ka0 sī0), pathaviṃsito (ka0 si0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)} siyā, catubbhi vātehi asampakampiyo.
[27] tathūpamaṃ sappurisaṃ vadāmi, yo ^a^T0.0007^ea^ ariyasaccāni avecca passati.
[22] idampi saṅghe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, etena saccena suvatthi hotu..
[27] kiñcāpi te honti bhusaṃ pamattā, na te bhavaṃ aṭṭhamamādiyanti.
[22] idampi saṅghe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, etena saccena suvatthi hotu..
[21] sahāvassa ^a^P0.0005^ea^ dassanasampadāya {sahāvasaddassanasampadāya (ka0)}, tayassu dhammā jahitā bhavanti.
[22] sakkāyadiṭṭhī vicikicchitañca, sīlabbataṃ vāpi yadatthi kiñci..
[21] catūhapāyehi ca vippamutto, chaccābhiṭhānāni {cha cābhiṭhānāni (sī0 syā0)} abhabba kātuṃ {abhabbo kātuṃ (sī0)}.
[22] idampi saṅghe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, etena saccena suvatthi hotu..
[21] kiñcāpi ^a^V0.0007^ea^ so kamma {kammaṃ (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)} karoti pāpakaṃ, kāyena vācā uda cetasā vā.
[27] abhabba {abhabbo (bahūsu)} so tassa paṭicchadāya {paṭicchādāya (sī0)}, abhabbatā ^a^T0.0008^ea^ diṭṭhapadassa vuttā.
[22] idampi ^a^M0.0007^ea^ saṅghe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, etena saccena suvatthi hotu..
[21] vanappagumbe yatha {yathā (sī0 syā0)} phussitagge, gimhānamāse paṭhamasmiṃ {paṭhamasmi (?)} gimhe.
[27] tathūpamaṃ dhammavaraṃ adesayi {adesayī (sī0)}, nibbānagāmiṃ paramaṃ hitāya.
[22] idampi buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, etena saccena suvatthi hotu..
[21] varo varaññū varado varāharo, anuttaro dhammavaraṃ adesayi.
[22] idampi buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, etena saccena suvatthi hotu..
[21] khīṇaṃ purāṇaṃ nava natthi sambhavaṃ, virattacittāyatike bhavasmiṃ.
[27] te khīṇabījā avirūḷhichandā, nibbanti dhīrā yathāyaṃ {yathayaṃ (ka0)} padīpo.
[22] idampi saṅghe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, etena saccena suvatthi hotu..
[21] yānīdha bhūtāni samāgatāni, bhummāni ^a^T0.0009^ea^ vā yāni va antalikkhe.
[22] tathāgataṃ devamanussapūjitaṃ, buddhaṃ namassāma suvatthi hotu..
[21] yānīdha bhūtāni samāgatāni, bhummāni vā yāni va antalikkhe.
[22] tathāgataṃ devamanussapūjitaṃ, dhammaṃ ^a^P0.0006^ea^ namassāma suvatthi hotu..
[21] yānīdha ^a^M0.0008^ea^ bhūtāni samāgatāni, bhummāni vā yāni va antalikkhe.
[22] tathāgataṃ devamanussapūjitaṃ, saṅghaṃ namassāma suvatthi hotūti..
[22] na ^a^T0.0010^ea^ tesaṃ koci sarati, sattānaṃ kammapaccayā..
[21] evaṃ dadanti ñātīnaṃ, ye honti anukampakā.
[22] idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotu, sukhitā hontu ñātayo..
[21] te ca tattha samāgantvā, ñātipetā samāgatā.
[21] ciraṃ jīvantu no ñātī, yesaṃ hetu labhāmase.
[22] amhākañca katā pūjā, dāyakā ca anipphalā..
[21] na hi tattha kasi {kasī (sī0)} atthi, gorakkhettha na vijjati.
[27] vaṇijjā tādisī natthi, hiraññena kayokayaṃ {kayākkayaṃ (sī0), kayā kayaṃ (syā0)}.
[22] ito dinnena yāpenti, petā kālaṅkatā {kālakatā (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0)} tahiṃ..
[21] unname udakaṃ vuṭṭhaṃ, yathā ninnaṃ pavattati.
[21] adāsi ^a^M0.0009^ea^ ^a^V0.0009^ea^ me akāsi me, ñātimittā {ñāti mitto (?)} sakhā ca me.
[21] na hi ruṇṇaṃ vā soko vā, yā caññā paridevanā.
[22] na taṃ petānamatthāya, evaṃ tiṭṭhanti ñātayo..
[21] ayañca kho dakkhiṇā dinnā, saṅghamhi suppatiṭṭhitā.
[21] so ñātidhammo ca ayaṃ nidassito, petāna pūjā ca katā uḷārā.
[22] balañca bhikkhūnamanuppadinnaṃ {... manuppadinnavā (ka0)}, tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappakanti..
[22] atthe kicce samuppanne, atthāya me bhavissati..
[21] rājato vā duruttassa, corato pīḷitassa vā.
[27] iṇassa vā pamokkhāya, dubbhikkhe āpadāsu vā.
[22] na sabbo sabbadā eva, tassa taṃ upakappati..
[21] nidhi vā ṭhānā cavati, saññā vāssa vimuyhati.
[22] nāgā vā apanāmenti, yakkhā vāpi haranti naṃ..
[21] yassa ^a^T0.0012^ea^ dānena sīlena, saṃyamena damena ca.
[22] nidhī sunihito hoti, itthiyā purisassa vā..
[21] cetiyamhi ^a^M0.0010^ea^ ca saṅghe vā, puggale atithīsu vā.
[22] mātari pitari cāpi {vāpi (syā0 kaṃ0)}, atho jeṭṭhamhi bhātari..
[22] kayirātha dhīro puññāni, yo nidhi anugāmiko..
[21] suvaṇṇatā susaratā, susaṇṭhānā surūpatā {susaṇṭhānasurūpatā (sī0), susaṇṭhānaṃ surūpatā (syā0 kaṃ0)}.
[21] mānussikā ca sampatti, devaloke ca yā rati.
[21] mittasampadamāgamma, yonisova {yoniso ve (sī0), yoniso ce (syā0), yoniso ca (?)} payuñjato.
[21] paṭisambhidā ^a^V0.0011^ea^ vimokkhā ca, yā ca sāvakapāramī.
[22] sakko ujū ca suhujū {sūjū (sī0)} ca, suvaco cassa mudu anatimānī..
[21] santussako ^a^M0.0011^ea^ ca subharo ca, appakicco ca sallahukavutti.
[22] santindriyo ca nipako ca, appagabbho kulesvananugiddho..
[21] na ca khuddamācare kiñci, yena viññū pare upavadeyyuṃ.
[22] sukhinova khemino hontu, sabbasattā {sabbe sattā (sī0 syā0)} bhavantu sukhitattā..
[21] ye keci pāṇabhūtatthi, tasā vā thāvarā vanavasesā.
[22] dīghā vā yeva mahantā {mahanta (?)}, majjhimā rassakā aṇukathūlā..
[21] diṭṭhā vā yeva adiṭṭhā {adiṭṭha (?)}, ye va {ye ca (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)} dūre vasanti avidūre.
[22] bhūtā va {vā (syā0 kaṃ0 pī0 ka0)} sambhavesī va {vā (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)}, sabbasattā bhavantu sukhitattā..
[21] na paro paraṃ nikubbetha, nātimaññetha katthaci na kañci {naṃ kañci (sī0 pī0), naṃ kiñci (syā0), na kiñci (ka0)}.
[22] uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyañca, asambādhaṃ averamasapattaṃ..
[21] tiṭṭhaṃ caraṃ nisinno va {vā (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)}, sayāno yāvatāssa vitamiddho {vigatamiddho (bahūsu)}.
[22] kāmesu vinaya {vineyya (sī0)} gedhaṃ, na hi jātuggabbhaseyya puna retīti..
